Name: Chin Jian Jie
Matric Number: A175894

//PseudoCode for Task 1//
1. Initialize the array,sum variable and average variable 
2.create a for loop 
3.Create a input for the user
4.scan the input from the user and add it into the array
5.Sum up all the array
6.perform mean calculation of the mean array
7.print out the mean of the array
